mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply(id, user_id, event_id, ticket_id, applicant_num, phone, name) VALUES(apply_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{eventId}, #{ticketId}, #{applicantNum}, #{phone}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(applicant_num) FROM apply WHERE 1=1 AND event_id = #{eventId} AND delete_date IS NULL
SELECT CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS result FROM apply WHERE id = #{applyId}

SELECT id AS applyId, event_id AS eventId, ticket_id AS ticketId, applicant_num AS applicantNum, phone, apply_date AS applyDate, delete_date AS deleteDate, CASE WHEN apply_date > delete_date THEN apply_date ELSE delete_date END AS recentDate FROM apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY recentDate DESC
SELECT ticket_id AS ticketId, SUM(applicant_num) as appliedTicketCount FROM apply WHERE 1=1 AND event_id = #{eventId} AND delete_date IS NULL GROUP BY ticket_id

SELECT user_id AS userId, a.id AS applyId, phone, name, applicant_num AS applicantNum, ticket_id AS ticketId, delete_date AS deleteDate, ad.delete_or_apply_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN '결제 완료' ELSE '예약 취소' END AS state FROM apply a INNER JOIN (SELECT id, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN apply_date ELSE delete_date END AS delete_or_apply_date FROM apply) ad ON ad.id = a.id WHERE 1=1 AND event_id = #{eventId}
AND delete_date IS NULL
AND delete_date IS NOT NULL
AND a.id = #{applyId, jdbcType=NULL}
AND a.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone, jdbcType=NULL}, '%')
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=NULL}, '%')
AND ad.delete_or_apply_date BETWEEN DATE(#{dateMin}) AND DATE(#{dateMax})
AND ad.delete_or_apply_date >= DATE(#{dateMin})
AND ad.delete_or_apply_date <= DATE(#{dateMax})
ORDER BY a.id DESC
ORDER BY ad.delete_or_apply_date
select count(*) from apply where user_id = 1000
